EmailTemplate.description: Styled version of the License suspension email
EmailTemplate.name: License suspension notification Enhanced
EmailTemplate.subject: Copado license suspended pending verification of corporate email address
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Copado User,
Due to licensing constraints we require a corporate email address. Please could you send us an email from your corporate address for your license to be activated.
We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience. Once the corporate email has been verified your application will be enabled.
Many thanks in advance.
Copado Team www.copa.do
You are receiving this email because our records indicate you are the subscriber to the Copado Application. To unsubscribe click here
